title: Not Earrning Chests / Key Fragments
body: I recently got chat restrictions for bad behavior, I then grinded out all my games to get the restriction off. It seems that i still don't get any rewards after game, even though i have no restriction! Please help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

You don't immediately recover the privilege of earning hextech loot after your punishment is over, you simply enter a reform period, ending this reform period requires consistent displays of good sportsmanship. Your reform period isn't over after a specific number of games, or after a certain date, but is completely dependent upon your behavior.

Check out the [Hextech Crafting Restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) support article for more information.
